name: The Museum (PauSanchez63)
description:
You've been investigating too much time for letting those "intellectuals"get away with it. You've infiltrated into The Museum for showing them you were right. The Rah's treasure will be yours!!

"The Museum" is a 4-students project made at the end of our studies as part of our final project. It's a puzzles game made in 6 months and developed totally by us using Unity as the engine and the softwares Blender, 3dsMax, Substance Painter, Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator and ZBrush. "The Museum" is totally on Spanish so maybe you can have troubles trying to solve one of our puzzles. Anyway, if you want give it a try, just text me if you got stuck.
